description: A precise fit and a confidence-inspiring tread open up all-terrain riding and help you motor through the must-walk sections. These are great for trail riders who use a smaller clip-in pedal platform. The asymmetric opening is fastened by a single micro-adjustable Boa L6 Dial with a steel-coated nylon lace and a microfibre Velcro strap. It's fast to tune the fit and accommodate all foot shapes. A carbon composite sole combined with stiff insole give you a platform to stomp on when you want all your power transferred direct to the pedals.Perforated synthetic upper is breathable, with thicker tongue to provide impact protection.Boa© L6 ratchet cable system allows for a custom fit that is easy to adjust over long rides.Carbon composite outsole combine with stiff insole to provide efficient power transfer.Pronounced tread encircles heel and forefoot area for reliable traction on all terrain.Durable woven tape heel loops are handy for carrying and storage.
name: Fizik X5 Terra Cycling Shoes - Unisex
